overview:
Mike Hughes joins 247Customer as Managing Director for European Operations. Mike joins 24/7 Customer, Inc. with a wealth of experience in the Customer Service Industry. He has over 20 years of experience in Customer Management, Change Leadership and IT. With the UK and Europe targeted as the focus markets for 24/7 Customer, Mike will be instrumental in creating new industry best practices from his rich pool of Customer Service experience.

Prior to joining 24/7 Customer, Mike ran his own Customer Management and Business Transformation consultancy PeopleTECH with clients in a range of industry sectors. He has held a number of senior Customer Management and IT roles such as CEO, Orange India Services Ltd; a dual responsibility of Vice President - Customer Service & Vice President - Transformation at Orange/FT Group; Managing Director at BskyB and, most recently VP of Transformation at Orange, having initially lead Service operations in both the UK and India.
